tika-s0303t:14_2: Tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīvasena “bhaggā”tveva vuccatīti katvā vuttaṃ “evaṃnāmake janapade”ti,
tika-s0303t:14_4: Tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍeti yo pana vanasaṇḍo pubbe migānaṃ abhayatthāya dinno,
tika-s0303t:14_6: Yasmā so gahapati tasmiṃ nagare “nakulapitā”ti puttassa vasena paññāyittha,
tika-s0303t:14_7: tasmā vuttaṃ “nakulapitā”ti nakulassa nāma dārakassa pitāti attho.
tika-s0303t:15_5: Tiyaddhagatoti paṭhamo majjhimo pacchimoti tayo addhe gato.
tika-s0303t:15_6: Tattha paṭhamaṃ dutiyañca atikkantattā pacchimaṃ upagatattā vayoanuppatto.
tika-s0303t:15_9: Tathā hi saccavibhaṅge dukkhasaccaniddese dukkhaggahaṇeneva gahitattā byādhi na niddiṭṭho.
tika-s0303t:15_19: Anusāsatūti anu anu sāsatūti ayamettha atthoti āha –
tika-s0303t:16_0: Aṇḍaṃ viya bhūtoti adhikopamā kāyassa aṇḍakosato abaladubbalabhāvato.
tika-s0303t:17_0: Vippasannānīti pakatimākāraṃ atikkamitvā visesena pasannāni. Tenāha –
tika-s0303t:17_2: Pasannacittasamuṭṭhitarūpasampadāhi tāhi tassa mukhavaṇṇassa pārisuddhīti āha –
tika-s0303t:17_7: Nayaggāhapaññā kiresāti idaṃ anāvajjanavaseneva vuttabhāvaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0303t:18_1: bhagavā yathā mayaṃ paralokepi aññamaññaṃ samāgaccheyyāmā”ti vuttavacanaṃ sandhāya vuttameva.
tika-s0303t:19_10: Yadipi ariyasaddo “ye hi vo ariyā parisuddhakāyakammantā”tiādīsu visuddhāsayapayogesu puthujjanesupi vaṭṭati,
tika-s0303t:19_11: idha pana ariyamaggādhigamena sabbalokuttarabhāvena ca ariyabhāvo adhippetoti dassento āha –
tika-s0303t:19_13: Tattha paccekabuddhā tathāgatasāvakā ca sappurisāti idaṃ “ariyā sappurisā”ti idha vuttapadānaṃ atthaṃ asaṅkarato dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:20_1: tassa hi ekantena kalyāṇamitto icchitabbo parato ghosamantarena paṭhamamaggassa anuppajjanato.
tika-s0303t:20_4: kalyāṇamittaṃ āgamma jātidhammā sattā jātiyā parimuccantī”tiādi.
tika-s0303t:20_5: So eva ca aveccapasādādhigamena daḷhabhatti nāma.
tika-s0303t:20_6: Vuttampi cetaṃ “yaṃ mayā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-s0303t:20_8: Kataññutādīhi paccekabuddhabuddhāti ettha kataṃ jānātīti kataññū.
tika-s0303t:20_10: Paccekabuddhā hi anekesupi kappasatasahassesu kataṃ upakāraṃ jānanti,
tika-s0303t:20_14: Sammāsambuddho pana kappānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyasahassesupi kataṃ upakāraṃ maggaphalānaṃ upanissayañca jānanti,
tika-s0303t:20_16: Sīho viya ca evaṃ sabbattha sakkaccameva dhammadesanaṃ karontena buddhakiccaṃ karonti.
tika-s0303t:20_17: Yāya paṭipattiyā ariyā diṭṭhā nāma honti,
tika-s0303t:20_21: Cakkhunā adassāvīti ettha cakkhu nāma na maṃsacakkhu eva,
tika-s0303t:21_2: Evaṃ vuttepīti evaṃ aññāpadesena attupanāyikaṃ katvā vuttepi.
tika-s0303t:22_0: Avinītoti na vinīto adhisīlasikkhādīnaṃ vasena na sikkhito.
tika-s0303t:22_7: Ñāṇasaṃvaroti “sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmī”ti vatvā “paññāyete pidhīyare”ti vacanato sotasaṅkhātānaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhiduccaritaavijjāavasiṭṭhakilesānaṃ
tika-s0303t:22_10: sā ca tathāpavattā khandhā, adoso vā,
tika-s0303t:22_13: Tena tena aṅgena tassa tassa aṅgassa pahānaṃ tadaṅgappahānaṃ.
tika-s0303t:23_9: kāyādīnaṃ vā jimhapavattiṃ vicchinditvā ujukanayanatoti attho.
tika-s0303t:23_10: Paccayasamavāye uppajjanārahānaṃ kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ tathā tathā anuppādanameva saṃvaraṇaṃ vinayanañca veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0303t:24_6: “natthi ettha attā vā attaniyaṃ vā”ti evaṃ pavattañāṇaṃ nāmarūpavavatthānaṃ.
tika-s0303t:24_8: sayaṃ vā satī tasmiṃ kāye diṭṭhi sakkāyadiṭṭhi,
tika-s0303t:24_9: sā ca “rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”ti evaṃ pavattā attadiṭṭhi.
tika-s0303t:24_13: “Issarapurisapajāpatipakatiaṇukālādīhi loko pavattati nivattati cā”ti tathā tathā pavattā diṭṭhi visamahetudiṭṭhi.
tika-s0303t:24_15: Kaṅkhāvitaraṇenāti yathā etarahi nāmarūpassa kammādipaccayato uppatti,
tika-s0303t:24_16: evaṃ atīte anāgatepīti tīsu kālesu vicikicchāpanayanañāṇena.
tika-s0303t:24_17: Kathaṃkathībhāvassāti “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”ntiādinayapavattāya saṃsayappavattiyā.
tika-s0303t:24_18: Kalāpasammasanenāti “yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppanna”ntiādinā khandhapañcakaṃ ekādasasu okāsesu
tika-s0303t:24_23: Yasmā sammadeva saṅkhārānaṃ udayaṃ passanto “evamete saṅkhārā anurūpakāraṇato uppajjanti,
tika-s0303t:24_26: Yasmā pana saṅkhārānaṃ vayaṃ “yadipime saṅkhārā avicchinnā vattanti,
tika-s0303t:24_27: uppannuppannā pana appaṭisandhikā nirujjhantevā”ti passato kuto sassataggāho.
tika-s0303t:24_30: Sabhayeti sabbabhayānaṃ ākarabhāvato sakaladukkhavūpasamasaṅkhātassa paramassāsassa paṭipakkhabhāvato ca sabhaye khandhapañcake.
tika-s0303t:24_44: Saṅkhāranimittaggāhoti yādisassa kilesassa appahīnatā vipassanā saṅkhāranimittaṃ na muñcati,
tika-s0303t:25_3: saddena nīvaraṇapakkhiyā kilesā vitakkavicārādayo ca gayhanti.
tika-s0303t:25_4: Catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ bhāvitattā accantaṃ appavattibhāvena yaṃ pahānanti sambandho.
tika-s0303t:25_7: “Samudayapakkhikassā”ti ettha cattāropi maggā catusaccābhisamayāti katvā tehi pahātabbena tena tena samudayasaṅkhātena
tika-s0303t:25_9: Saccavibhaṅge ca sabbakilesānaṃ samudayabhāvassa vuttattā “samudayapakkhikā”ti diṭṭhiādayo vuccanti.
tika-s0303t:26_3: Pahānañca taṃ vinayo cāti pahānavinayo purimena atthena.
tika-s0303t:28_0: So ahanti attanā parikappitaṃ attānaṃ diṭṭhigatiko vadati.
tika-s0303t:28_3: Abhinnaṃ vaṇṇameva “accī”ti gahetvā “accīti vaṇṇo evā”ti tesaṃ ekattaṃ passanto viya yathāparikappitaṃ attānaṃ “rūpa”nti,
tika-s0303t:28_6: Ettha ca “rūpaṃ attā”ti imissā pavattiyā abhāvepi rūpe attaggahaṇaṃ pavattamānaṃ acciyaṃ vaṇṇaggahaṇaṃ viya “advayadassana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:28_9: Na hi attani sāmibhāvena rūpañca sakiñcanabhāvena samanupassati.
tika-s0303t:28_10: Attani vā rūpanti attānaṃ rūpassa sabhāvato ādhāraṇabhāvena.
tika-s0303t:28_11: Rūpasmiṃ vā attānanti rūpassa attano ādhāraṇabhāvena diṭṭhipassanāya passati.
tika-s0303t:28_13: rūpavā attā”tiādinā khandhapañcakaṃ micchā gahetvā tiṭṭhanato.
tika-s0303t:28_15: Eseva nayoti yo “idhekacco rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”tiādinā rūpakkhandhe vutto saṃvaṇṇanānayo,
tika-s0303t:29_2: Catūsu khandhesu tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vasenāti catūsu khandhesu tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ gahaṇavasena rūpārūpamissako attā
tika-s0303t:29_3: kathito tasmiṃ tasmiṃ gahaṇe vedanādivinimuttaarūpadhamme kasiṇarūpena saddhiṃ sabbarūpadhamme ca ekajjhaṃ
tika-s0303t:29_6: te te eva dhamme “attā”ti gahaṇato tesañca ucchedabhāvato.
tika-s0303t:29_7: Avasesesu pana pannarasasu ṭhānesu rūpaṃ “attā”ti gahetvāpi diṭṭhigatiko tattha niccasaññaṃ na vissajjeti
tika-s0303t:29_8: kasiṇarūpena taṃ missetvā tassa ca uppādādīnaṃ adassanato,
tika-s0303t:30_8: Anāturacittataṃyeva bhajanti vaṭṭānusārimahājanassa viya tesaṃ cittassa kilesavasena āturattābhāvato.
tika-s0303t:33_1: Devā vuccanti rājāno “dibbanti kāmaguṇehi kīḷanti laḷanti,
tika-s0303t:33_6: Tassa avidūre nigamo “devadaha”ntveva saṅkhaṃ gato yathā “varaṇānagaraṃ,
tika-s0303t:33_10: Te sabhāreti te bhikkhū therassa vasena sabhāre kātukāmatāya.
tika-s0303t:33_12: therassapi te bhārā evāti “te sabhāre kātukāmatāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:33_13: Evañhi thero te ovaditabbe anusāsitabbe maññatīti.
tika-s0303t:33_15: Ayaṃ nibbhāro nāma kañci puggalaṃ attano bhāraṃ katvā avattanato.
tika-s0303t:34_0: Catubbidhenāti dhātukosallaṃ āyatanakosallaṃ paṭiccasamuppādakosallaṃ ṭhānāṭṭhānakosallanti evaṃ catubbidhena.
tika-s0303t:40_5: Ruppanasabhāvo dhammoti katvā rūpadhātūti rūpakkhandho vutto.
tika-s0303t:40_6: Rūpadhātumhi ārammaṇapaccayabhūtena rāgena sahajātenapi asahajātenapi upanissayabhūtena appahīnabhāveneva vinibaddhaṃ paṭibaddhaṃ kammaviññāṇaṃ.
tika-s0303t:41_0: Ugacchati vā ettha vedanādīhi saddhiṃ samavetīti oko,
tika-s0303t:41_3: Paccayo hotīti anantarasamanantarādinā ceva kammūpanissayaārammaṇādinā ca.
tika-s0303t:41_5: gahapatī”ti evaṃ vutte “kammaviññāṇavipākaviññāṇesu kataraṃ nu kho”ti sammoho bhaveyya.
tika-s0303t:42_3: Abhinivesabhūtāti taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ abhinivissa ajjhosāya pavattiyā kāraṇabhūtā.
tika-s0303t:42_7: Pubbe aggahitaṃ viññāṇaṃ aggahitamevāti katvā kasmā idha desanā katāti codeti –
tika-s0303t:42_9: Pubbe “viññāṇadhāturāgavinibandhañca viññāṇa”nti vuccamāne yathā yathā sammoho siyā paccayapaccayuppannavibhāgassa dukkarattā,
tika-s0303t:42_10: idha pana sammohassa okāsova natthi avisesena pañcasu khandhesu kilesappahānavasenāti.
tika-s0303t:43_3: niketanti ārammaṇakaraṇasaṅkhātena nivāsaṭṭhānabhūtena rūpameva niketanti rūpanimittaniketaṃ.
tika-s0303t:44_0: Chandarāgassa balavadubbalatāyāti ajjhattakhandhapañcake chandarāgassa balavabhāvena taṃ “oko”ti,
tika-s0303t:44_1: bahiddhā chasu ārammaṇesu tassa dubbalatāya tāni “niketa”nti vuttāni.
tika-s0303t:44_2: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “samānepi hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:45_0: Gehassitasukhenāti gehanissitena cittassa sukhena sukhito sukhappatto hoti.
tika-s0303t:45_1: Kiccakaraṇīyesūti khuddakesu ceva mahantesu ca kattabbatthesu.
tika-s0303t:46_1: Vaṇṇasaddo viya rūpasaddo rūpāyatanassa viya saṇṭhānassapi vācakoti adhippāyena “dīgharassa kāḷodātādīsu rūpesū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:46_3: Tattha hi “abhiṇhaṃ somanassito bhaveyya”nti patthanā siyā.
tika-s0303t:46_5: Evaṃviññāṇoti pana idha visayamukhena viññāṇavisesapatthanaṃ vadati –
tika-s0303t:47_0: Vaṭṭaṃ purato akurūmānoti loke cittaṃ apatthento.
tika-s0303t:53_5: Patthetīti “aho vata me īdisaṃ rūpaṃ bhaveyyā”ti.
tika-s0303t:53_8: “Aho piyaṃ iṭṭha”nti vacībhede asatipi tathā lobhuppāde sati abhivadatiyeva nāma.
tika-s0303t:53_10: “Mama ida”nti attano pariṇāmetvā anaññagocaraṃ viya katvā gaṇhanto ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati nāmāti dassento āha “gilitvāti pariniṭṭhapetvā gaṇhātī”ti.
tika-s0303t:53_15: Nābhinandati nābhivadatīti ettha heṭṭhā vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0303t:56_2: tasmiṃ sati upadhiviveko ca imesaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ñatvā āha.
tika-s0303t:59_1: Gahaṇena uppannaṃ paritassananti khandhapañcake “ahaṃ mamā”ti gahaṇena uppannaṃ taṇhāparitassanaṃ diṭṭhiparitassanañca.
tika-s0303t:59_5: Kammaviññāṇanti vipariṇāmārammaṇaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhisahagataṃ viññāṇaṃ tadanuvatti ca.
tika-s0303t:59_6: Anuparivatti nāma taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatti.
tika-s0303t:59_12: Gaṇhitvāti taṇhādiṭṭhiggāhehi gahetvā tesañceva vasena paritassako.
tika-s0303t:65_2: paccuppannampi tadā natthīti ko pana vādo tassa aniccatāya,
tika-s0303t:68_1: Tathārūpenevāti yathārūpeneva puggalajjhāsayena navamaṃ suttaṃ kathitaṃ,
tika-s0303t:78_4: Tattha yasmā etāni ṭhānagamanādīni rūpārūpadhammānaṃ paṅgulajaccandhānaṃ viya aññamaññūpassayavasena ijjhanti,
tika-s0303t:78_8: Khandhasantāno hi avicchedena pavattamāno yāva parinibbānā khandhabhāraṃ vahanto viya loke khāyati tabbinimuttassa sattassa abhāvato.
tika-s0303t:79_17: Esa puggalo khandhabhāraṃ ādiyati taṇhāvasena paṭisandhiggahaṇato.
tika-s0303t:79_18: “Asesamettha taṇhā virajjati palujjati nirujjhati pahīyatī”tiādinā sabbapadāni nibbānavaseneva veditabbānīti āha “sabbaṃ nibbānasseva vevacana”nti.
tika-s0303t:88_4: Cattāri saccāni kathitāni assādādīnavanissaraṇavasena desanāya pavattattā.
tika-s0303t:91_3: Idañhi dukkhaṃ nāma visesato pāpahetukaṃ kammaphalasaññitaṃ.
tika-s0303t:91_6: Vaṭṭānusārī mahājano hi dukkhābhibhūto tassa patikāraṃ maññamāno taṃ taṃ karotīti.
tika-s0303t:99_2: Dabbādi pākatikatiṇaṃ pākaṭamevāti apākaṭaṃ dassetuṃ tālanāḷikerādi dassitaṃ,
tika-s0303t:102_1: Yadi rūpaṃ anusetīti rūpadhamme ārabbha yadi rāgādayo anusayanavasena pavattanti.
tika-s0303t:102_2: Tena saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti tena rāgādinā taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo saṅkhātabbataṃ “ratto duṭṭho”tiādinā voharitabbataṃ upagacchatīti.
tika-s0303t:102_6: Yato “ratto duṭṭho mūḷhoti saṅkhaṃ na gacchatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:105_1: Taṃ anusayitaṃ rūpanti taṃ rāgādinā anusayitaṃ rūpaṃ marantena anusayena anumarati.
tika-s0303t:105_4: Tena saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti tathābhūtato tena “ratto”tiādivohāraṃ labhati.
tika-s0303t:108_4: Paccayavasena dharamānattā eva jīvamānassa jīvitindriyavasena jarā paññāyati uppādakkhaṇato aññathattappattiyā.
tika-s0303t:108_5: Vuttameva atthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ “ṭhitī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Jīvi…pe… nāmaṃ.
tika-s0303t:109_1: Yo koci rūpadhammo vā arūpadhammo vā lokiyo vā lokuttaro vā saṅkhāro. Saṅkhāro,
tika-s0303t:109_6: Nāpi lakkhaṇaṃ vinā saṅkhāro paññāpetuṃ sakkā saṅkhārabhāvena.
tika-s0303t:109_9: Tattha lakkhaṇanti kāḷarattasabalādibhāvalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti “ayaṃ asukassa gāvī”ti.
tika-s0303t:110_0: Evaṃ saṅkhāropi paññāyati sabhāvato upadhārentassa uppādalakkhaṇampi uppādāvatthāti katvā.
tika-s0303t:110_7: “Bhaṅgakkhaṇe saṅkhāropi taṃlakkhaṇampi kālasaṅkhāto tassa khaṇopi paññāyatī”ti pāṭho.
tika-s0303t:110_9: Evañca vadanti “na hi tasmiṃ khaṇe taruṇo hutvā saṅkhāro bhijjati,
tika-s0303t:110_10: atha kho jiyyamāno mahallako viya jiṇṇo eva hutvā bhijjatī”ti,
tika-s0303t:110_11: bhaṅgeneva pana jarā abhibhuyyati khaṇassa atiittarabhāvato na sakkā paññāpetuṃ ṭhitiyāti tesaṃ adhippāyo.
tika-s0303t:110_15: Sabbadhammānanti sabbesaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā na bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-s0303t:110_20: Yasmā sutte “ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyatī”ti uppādavayehi nibbisesena ṭhitiyā jotitattā.
tika-s0303t:110_23: Apica yathā dhammassa uppādāvatthāya bhinnā bhaṅgāvatthā icchitā,
tika-s0303t:110_27: Na cettha sakkā uppādābhimukhāvatthaṃ parikappetuṃ tadā tassa aladdhattalābhattā.
tika-s0303t:113_1: Apāyadukkhe sakalasaṃsāradukkhe ca patituṃ adatvā dhāraṇaṭṭhena dhammo,
tika-s0303t:113_11: Tathāti iminā ito paresu tīsu maggo hotīti dasseti.
tika-s0303t:113_16: Tattha niyamitavasenevāti idaṃ lakkhaṇavacanaṃ yathā “yadi me byādhayo bhaveyyuṃ,
tika-s0303t:113_18: Na hi sakkā etissā eva anupassanāya vasena sammasanācāraṃ matthakaṃ pāpetunti.
tika-s0303t:118_1: Dvīhi bhāgehi āpo ettha gatāti dīpo,
tika-s0303t:118_3: Yo paro na hoti, so attā,
tika-s0303t:118_9: Paṭhamena padena vutto eva attho dutiyapadena vuccatīti vuttaṃ “tenevāhā”tiādi.
tika-s0303t:118_10: Yavati etasmā phalaṃ pasavatīti yoni, kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0303t:118_11: Kiṃ pabhuti uppattiṭṭhānaṃ etesanti kiṃ pabhutikā.
tika-s0303t:121_1: Sabhāvatosanto vijjamāno kāyo rūpādidhammasamūhoti sakkāyoti āha –
tika-s0303t:121_6: Saha vipassanāya catumaggañāṇaṃ samanupassanā “catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ sammadeva anurūpato passanā”ti katvā.
tika-s0303t:124_5: Aggahetvāti evaṃ nirujjhamānehi āsavehi “ahaṃ mamā”ti kañci dhammaṃ anādiyitvā.
tika-s0303t:124_12: taṃ aggaphalassa pattabhāvena adhigatattā santuṭṭhaṃ parituṭṭhaṃ.
tika-s0303t:127_7: dve adhiccasamuppannadiṭṭhiyoti evaṃ aṭṭhārasa diṭṭhiyo na honti paccayaghātena.
tika-s0303t:127_8: Aparantanti anāgataṃ khandhakoṭṭhāsaṃ sassatādibhāvaṃ kappetvā gahaṇavasena anugatā.
tika-s0303t:127_13: pañca paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānavādāti evaṃ catucattālīsa diṭṭhiyo na honti paccayaghātena.
tika-s0303t:127_14: Sassatadiṭṭhithāmaso ceva sīlabbatadiṭṭhiparāmāso ca na hoti paccayaghātena.
tika-s0303t:130_4: Yassa puggalassa ayaṃ attadiṭṭhisaṅkhātā samanupassanā atthi paṭipakkhena avihatattā saṃvijjati.
tika-s0303t:131_1: Mānavasena ca diṭṭhivasena ca “asmī”ti gāhe sijjhante taṃsahagatā taṇhāpi taggahitāva hotīti vuttaṃ “taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena asmīti evampissa hotī”ti.
tika-s0303t:131_5: “Rūpī attā arogo paraṃ maraṇā”ti evamādigahaṇavasena pavattanato vuttaṃ “rūpī bhavissantiādīni sabbāni sassatameva bhajantī”ti.
tika-s0303t:131_7: atha vipassanābhinivesato paraṃ tenevākārena ṭhitesu cakkhādīsu indriyesu avijjā pahīyati vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhaetvā maggassa uppādanena,
tika-s0303t:131_13: Tayo papañcā atīto addhā atītabhavaaddhānaṃ tesaṃ adhippetattā.
tika-s0303t:131_14: Anāgatassa paccayo dassito assutavato puthujjanassa vasena.
tika-s0303t:131_15: Sutavato pana ariyasāvakassa vasena vaṭṭassa vūpasamo dassitoti.
tika-s0303t:137_3: Aññaṃ kiṃ bhaveyyāti aññaṃ kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhaveyya tathā samanupassanāya aññesaṃ avijjamānatāya vacanapariṭṭhitipabhinnato.
tika-s0303t:140_5: Satipi saddatthato bhede “imesaṃ atthato ninnānākaraṇatāyā”ti vatvāpi pahāyakadhammabhedena pana labbhateva
tika-s0303t:140_13: Anantaraṃ pana uppannena ariyaphalena paṭipassaddhivasena nandirāgakkhayā sabbaṃ saṃkilesato cittaṃ vimuccatīti.
tika-s0303t:146_7: kiṃ upetīti āha “pañcakkhandhe”ti tabbinimuttassa tathā upetassa abhāvato.
tika-s0303t:146_10: Taṇhādiṭṭhivasena upagamassa vuttattā viññāṇanti akusalakammaviññāṇamevāti vadanti.
tika-s0303t:146_15: Aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ vuttameva “okaṃ pahāya aniketasārī”ti gāthāya vissajjane.
tika-s0303t:146_16: Kammanimittādivasena paṭisandhiyā paccayabhūtaṃ ārammaṇaṃ paṭisandhijanakassa kammassa vasena vocchijjati.
tika-s0303t:146_17: Patiṭṭhā na hoti sarāgakāle viya anupaṭṭhānato.
tika-s0303t:149_8: Na upakappatīti paccayo na hotīti dasseti.
tika-s0303t:149_15: Tathā hi viropitaṃ taṃ kammaviññāṇaṃ paṭisandhiaṅkuruppādanasamatthaṃ hoti.
tika-s0303t:152_6: Tattha dānūpanissayo annādivatthūsu balavāti balavabhāvena hoti,
tika-s0303t:152_7: tasmā upanissayabahulo kāmarāgappahāneneva kataparicayattā vipassanamanuyuñjanto na cirasseva anāgāmiphalaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-s0303t:152_9: Yadi evaṃ kasmā ime dve upanissayā dubbalāti vuttā?
tika-s0303t:152_13: Bhāvanā pana paṭivedhassa visesahetubhāvato balavā upanissayo.
tika-s0303t:154_0: Attaniyeva upanesi udānakathāya vuttadhammānaṃ paripuṇṇānaṃ attani saṃvijjamānattā.
tika-s0303t:154_2: Ayañhi milakatthero sikkhāya gāravo sappatisso vattapaṭivattaṃ pūrento visuddhasīlo hutvā ṭhito,
tika-s0303t:155_0: Sace ahaṃ na bhaveyyanti yadi ahaṃ nāma koci na bhaveyyaṃ tādisassa ahaṃsaddavacanīyassa kassaci atthassa abhāvato.
tika-s0303t:155_1: Tato eva mama parikkhāropi na bhaveyyatassa ca pabhaṅgubhāvena anavaṭṭhitabhāvato.
tika-s0303t:155_2: Evaṃ attuddesikabhāvena padadvayassa atthaṃ vatvā idāni kammaphalavasena vattuṃ “sace vā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:155_3: Atītapaccuppannavasena suññataṃ dassetvā idāni paccuppannānāgatavasena taṃ dassento “idāni panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:155_11: Sāmaññajotanā hesā visesaniṭṭhā hotīti tatiyamaggavasena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0303t:156_3: Gotrabhū pana anulomavīthipariyāpannattā vipassanāgatikaṃ vā siyā,
tika-s0303t:156_4: nibbānārammaṇattā maggagatikaṃ vāti na tena maggo antariko nāma hoti.
tika-s0303t:156_6: Phalaṃ pana nibbānārammaṇattā kilesānaṃ pajahanavasena pavattanato lokuttarabhāvato ca kammamaggagatikameva,
tika-s0303t:156_7: kusalavipākabhāvena pana nesaṃ attho pabhedoti vipassanāya phalassa siyā anantaratāti vuttaṃ “phalassa dūrānantaraṃ nāmā”ti.
tika-s0303t:156_8: “Āsavānaṃ khayo”ti pana aggamagge vuccamāne vipassanānaṃ āsannatāya vattabbameva natthi.
tika-s0303t:156_14: tato parampi tattheva ṭhatvā kiñci apūritattā eva muttoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0303t:156_15: “Na tāso nāma hotī”ti vatvā tassa atāsabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “na hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:156_16: Kalyāṇaputhujjano hi bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇena “sabhayā saṅkhārā”ti vipassanto na uttasati.
tika-s0303t:159_1: Catunnaṃ parivaṭṭanavasenāti paccekakkhandhesu catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ parivaṭṭanavasena.
tika-s0303t:159_2: Rūpaṃ abbhaññāsinti sakalabhūtupādārūpaṃ kucchitabhāvato tattha ca tucchavipallāsatāya “dukkhasacca”nti abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena aññāsiṃ paṭivijjhiṃ.
tika-s0303t:159_3: Āhāravasena rūpakāyassa hānivuddhādīnaṃ pākaṭabhāvato visesapaccayato ca tassa “āhārasamudayā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:159_7: Vattamānakālappayogo hesa yathā “kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-s0303t:159_9: Kevalinoti idha vimuttiguṇena pāripūrīti āha “sakalino katasabbakiccā”ti.
tika-s0303t:159_10: Yena teti yena avasiṭṭhena te asekkhe paññāpentā paññāpeyyuṃ,
tika-s0303t:159_11: taṃ nesaṃ vaṭṭaṃ sekkhānaṃ viya natthi paññāpanāya.
tika-s0303t:162_8: Idāni vuttameva atthaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:163_0: Ettāvatāti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ vasena sattasu ṭhānesu kosalladīpanena ettakena desanākkamena.
tika-s0303t:163_5: Evamettha pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ vasena sattaṭṭhānakosallapavattiyā pabhedena vibhajitvā “tividhūpaparikkhī”ti dasseti dhammarājā.
tika-s0303t:166_1: Adhikaṃ savisesaṃ payasati payuñjati etenāti adhippayāso,
tika-s0303t:166_7: Maggaṃ jānātīti samudāgamato paṭṭhāya sapubbabhāgaṃ sasambhāravisayaṃ saphalaṃ saudrayaṃ ariyaṃ maggaṃ jānāti avabujjhatīti maggaññū.
tika-s0303t:166_8: Viditanti aññesampi ñātaṃ paṭiladdhaṃ hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya pākaṭaṃ akāsi,
tika-s0303t:166_10: Amagge parivajjanena magge paṭipattīti tassa maggakusalatā viya amaggakusalatāpi icchitabbāti āha “magge ca amagge ca kovido”ti.
tika-s0303t:166_11: Ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ gatoti ahaṃ paṭhamamaggena samannāgato.
tika-s0303t:169_2: “Avasavattanaṭṭhena assāmikaṭṭhena suññataṭṭhena attapaṭikkhepaṭṭhenā”ti evaṃ pubbe vuttehi.
tika-s0303t:169_5: anattā”ti ārabhitvā yāva “evaṃ me viññāṇaṃ mā ahosī”ti ettakena suttapadesena.
tika-s0303t:169_11: Aniccatādīnampi hi tattha taṃdīpanatthameva vuttattā tadeva jeṭṭhaṃ padhānaṃ tathā veneyyajjhāsayato.
tika-s0303t:172_3: Ettha ca yathā sarāgo hetu paccayo saṃkilesāya,
tika-s0303t:172_4: evaṃ savipassano maggo hetu paccayo ca visuddhiyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0303t:175_1: Ekādasahīti rāgādīhi upāyāsapariyosānehi ekādasahi santāpanaṭṭhena aggīhi.
tika-s0303t:178_6: Tathā hi “phusatīti phasso”tiādinā nīharitvā vacanaṃ nirutti,
tika-s0303t:178_7: “sirīvaḍḍhako dhanavaḍḍhako”tiādinā vacanamattameva adhikāraṃ katvā pavattaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
tika-s0303t:178_17: Atthassa paññāpanatthena paññattīti evaṃ niruttiādipadānaṃ sabbavacanesu pavatti veditabbā.
tika-s0303t:178_20: “Takko vitakko”ti evaṃpakārānameva ekameva atthaṃ tena tena pakārena ñāpentānaṃ vacanānaṃ paññattitā ca āpajjeyya.
tika-s0303t:178_27: Yasmā bhaṅgaṃ atikkantaṃ uppādādi atikkantameva hoti,
tika-s0303t:178_32: tattha tattheva bhijjanti nirujjhanti vipariṇamanti vināsaṃ āpajjanti.
tika-s0303t:179_3: Punappunaṃ āvajjentassāti ahetuvādapaṭisaṃyuttaganthaṃ uggahetvā pariyāpuṇitvā tadatthaṃ vīmaṃsantassa “natthi hetu,
tika-s0303t:179_4: natthi paccayo sattānaṃ saṃkilesāyā”tiādinayappavattāya laddhiyā ārammaṇe micchāsati santiṭṭhati,
tika-s0303t:179_5: “natthi hetū”tiādivasena anussavūpaladdhe atthe tadākāraparivitakkanehi saviggahe viya sarūpato cittassa
tika-s0303t:179_7: punappunaṃ tatheva āsevantassa bahulīkarontassa micchāvitakkena samādiyamānā micchāvāyāmūpatthambhitā
tika-s0303t:179_8: ataṃsabhāvaṃ “taṃsabhāva”nti gaṇhantī micchāsatīti laddhanāmā taṃladdhisahagatā taṇhā santiṭṭhati.
tika-s0303t:179_9: Yathāsakaṃ vitakkādipaccayalābhena tasmiṃ ārammaṇe adhiṭṭhitatāya anekaggataṃ pahāya cittaṃ ekaggataṃ appitaṃ viya hoti micchāsamādhinā.
tika-s0303t:179_10: Sopi hi paccayavisesehi laddhabhāvanābalo īdise ṭhāne samādhānapatirūpakiccakaro hotiyeva vālavijjhanādīsu viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0303t:179_11: Tathā hi anekakkhattuṃ tenākārena pubbabhāgiyesu javanavāresu pavattesu sabbapacchime javanavāre satta javanāni javanti.
tika-s0303t:179_14: Sattame pana javane sampatte atekiccho hoti.
tika-s0303t:180_4: Tepīti te vassabhaññāpi na maññiṃsu lokasamaññāya anatikkamanīyato.
tika-s0303t:185_6: Mutto nāma hoti anupādiyato sabbaso khandhassa abhāvato.
tika-s0303t:191_0: 69. Anattaniyanti na attaniyaṃ. Tenāha “na attano santaka”nti.
tika-s0303t:199_1: Catusaccameva kathitaṃ assādādīnañceva samudayādīnañca vasena desanāya pavattattā.
tika-s0303t:202_1: Yattakā sattāvāsāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sattanikāye āvasanaṭṭhena sattā eva sattāvāsā.
tika-s0303t:202_3: tehi sabbehipi ete aggā ete seṭṭhā,
tika-s0303t:203_2: Asmimāno samucchinno”tiādinā tassa yathāniddiṭṭhassa suttassa atthadīpanāhi ceva “anejaṃ te anuppattā,
tika-s0303t:203_6: Taṇhā tesaṃ na vijjatīti ettha tesaṃ apāyadukkhajanikā taṇhā na vijjatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:203_7: Vaṭṭamūlikāya taṇhāya abhāvā “nandī tesaṃ na vijjatī”ti ettha vuccatīti.
tika-s0303t:203_9: saddena dukkhassābhāvenapīti dukkhābhāvo viya vaṭṭamūlikataṇhābhāvo sampiṇḍīyatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0303t:203_10: Tena hi te anupādisesanibbānappattiyā accantasukhitā evāti vuccantīti.
tika-s0303t:204_3: brahmato vā ariyamaggañāṇato bhūtā ariyāya jātiyā jātā.
tika-s0303t:204_4: Satta saddhammā gocaro pavattiṭṭhānaṃ etesanti sattasaddhammagocarā.
tika-s0303t:205_0: Nirāsaṅkacāro nāma gahito kutocipi tesaṃ āsaṅkāya abhāvato.
tika-s0303t:205_4: Taṇhā tesaṃ na vijjatīti idampi taṇhāpahānassa bahūpakāratādassanaṃ.
tika-s0303t:207_0: Uddhaṃ tiriyaṃ apācīnanti ettha “uddhaṃ vuccatī”tiādinā rūpamukhena attabhāvaṃ gahetvā pavatto paṭhamanayo.
tika-s0303t:208_4: Sakalampi bhavaṃ uttaritvā bhavapiṭṭhe ṭhatvā vimuttisukhena sukhitattādivasena ekavīsatiyākārehi sīhanādaṃ nadanti.
tika-s0303t:214_1: Sīhoti parissayasahanato paṭipakkhahananato ca “sīho’ti laddhanāmo migādhipati.
tika-s0303t:214_2: Cattāroti ca samānepi sīhajātikabhāve vaṇṇavisesādisiddhena visesena cattāro sīhā.
tika-s0303t:214_3: Te idāni nāmato vaṇṇato āhārato dassetvā idhādhippetasīhaṃ nānappakārato vibhāvetuṃ “tiṇasīho”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0303t:214_4: Tiṇabhakkho sīho tiṇasīho purimapade uttarapadalopena yathā “sākapatthivo”ti.
tika-s0303t:214_9: Rattakambalassa viya kesaro kesarakalāpo etassa atthīti kesarī.
tika-s0303t:215_0: Kammānubhāvasiddhaādhipaccamahesakkhatāhi sabbamigagaṇassa rājā suvaṇṇaguhato vātiādi “sīhassa vihāro kiriyā evaṃ hotī”ti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:216_0: Samaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvāti sabbabhāgehi samameva bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā.
tika-s0303t:217_4: atha kho mayameva mahābalā”ti evaṃ balātimānanimittāya ahaṅkārahetubhūtāya sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā balabhāvena.
tika-s0303t:217_5: Sakkāyadiṭṭhipahīnattāti sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā pahīnattā nirahaṅkārattā attasinehassa suṭṭhu samugghāṭitattā na bhāyati.
tika-s0303t:218_0: Tathā tathāti sīhasadisatādinā tena tena pakārena attānaṃ kathesīti vatvā tamatthaṃ vivaritvā dassetuṃ “sīhoti kho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:219_0: Katābhinīhārassa lokanāthassa bodhiyā niyatabhāvappattiyā ekantabhāvībuddhabhāvoti katvā “tīsu pāsādesu nivāsakālo,
tika-s0303t:219_2: pāyāsassa paribhuttakālo”tiādinā abhisambodhito purimāvatthāpi sīhasadisaṃ katvā dassitā. Bhāvini,
tika-s0303t:219_4: Vijjābhāvasāmaññato bhūtavijjā itaravijjāpi ekajjhaṃ gahetvā paṭiccasamuppādasammasanato taṃ puretaraṃ
tika-s0303t:219_5: siddhaṃ vipākaṃ viya katvā āha “tisso vijjā visodhetvā”ti.
tika-s0303t:220_1: Ekādasame divaseti sattasattāhato paraṃ ekādasame divase.
tika-s0303t:220_3: Tampi hi kenaci appaṭivattiyadhammacakkapavattanatthaṃ nisajjāti katvā vajirāsanaṃ viya acalapallaṅkaṃ vuccati.
tika-s0303t:220_12: maggabhāvanā”ti evaṃ ekekasmiṃ magge cattāri cattāri katvā soḷasahi ākārehi.
tika-s0303t:221_3: Yasmā ca aparehipi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgatoti ārabhitvā udānaṭṭhakathādīsupi tathāgatapadassa attho vutto eva,
tika-s0303t:221_5: Yadipi bhagavā na bodhipallaṅke nisinnamattova abhisambuddho jāto,
tika-s0303t:221_6: tathāpi tāya nisajjāya nisinnova panujja sabbaparissayaṃ abhisambuddho jāto.
tika-s0303t:221_8: Tasmā “yāva bodhipallaṅkā vā”ti vatvā tena aparitussanto “yāva arahattamaggañāṇā vā”ti āha.
tika-s0303t:222_2: Tena rūpaṃ sarūpato parimāṇato paricchedato dassitanti āha “idaṃ rupa”ntiādi.
tika-s0303t:222_3: “Idaṃ rūpa”nti hi iminā bhūtupādāyabhedarūpaṃ sarūpato dassitaṃ.
tika-s0303t:222_4: Ettakaṃ rūpanti iminā taṃ parimāṇato dassitaṃ.
tika-s0303t:222_5: Tassa ca parimāṇassa ekantabhāvadassanena “na ito bhiyyo rūpaṃ atthī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:222_12: Taṃ sabbaṃ dassitaṃ hoti yathāvuttena vibhāgena.
tika-s0303t:222_13: Ayaṃ rūpassa samudayo nāmāti ayaṃ āhārādi rūpassa samudayo nāma.
tika-s0303t:222_16: “Āhārasamudayā āhāranirodhā”ti ca asādhāraṇameva gahetvā sese ādi-
tika-s0303t:223_2: Anāgāmīnampi hi bhayaṃ cittutrāso ca na hotīti.
tika-s0303t:223_4: Itaresaṃ pana devānanti akhīṇāsave deve sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0303t:224_4: Duvidhepi ñāṇaṃ padhānanti ñāṇasīsena vuttaṃ “paṭivedhañāṇampi desanāñāṇampī”ti.
tika-s0303t:224_5: Idāni taṃ ñāṇadvayaṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ “paṭivedhañāṇaṃ nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:224_6: Yasmā cassa ñāṇassa suppaṭividdhattā bhagavā tāni saṭṭhi nayasahassāni veneyyānaṃ dassetuṃ samattho ahosi,
tika-s0303t:224_7: tasmā tāni saṭṭhi nayasahassāni tena ñāṇena saddhiṃyeva siddhānīti katvā dassento “saṭṭhiyā ca nayasahassehi paṭivijjhī”ti āha.
tika-s0303t:227_1: Vipassanāvasenāti etarahi rūpavedanādayo anussaritvā “pubbepāhaṃ evaṃvedano ahosi”nti atītānaṃ rūpavedanādīnaṃ
tika-s0303t:228_0: Yasmā te eva rūpādayo neva attā,
tika-s0303t:229_0: Kiñcāti hetuatthajotake kāraṇe paccattavacananti āha “kiñcāti kāraṇapucchā,
tika-s0303t:229_3: Kena kāraṇena rūpaṃ nāmāti kiṃ kāraṇaṃ nissāya rūpanti vuccatīti attho.
tika-s0303t:229_5: Ruppatīti ettha rūpaṃ nāma sītādivirodhipaccayasannipātena visadisuppatti.
tika-s0303t:229_8: so pana tattha accuggato pākāro viya ṭhito.
tika-s0303t:229_9: Tathā hi tattha sattā olambantā tiṭṭhanti.
tika-s0303t:229_14: Accantakhāre udaketi ātapasantāpābhāvena atisītabhāvameva sandhāya accantakhāratā vuttā siyā.
tika-s0303t:229_15: Na hi taṃ kappasaṇṭhānaudakaṃ sampattikaramahāmeghavuṭṭhaṃ pathavīsandhārakaṃ kappavināsaudakaṃ viya khāraṃ bhavituṃ arahati,
tika-s0303t:230_0: Avīcimahānirayeti saussadaṃ avīcinirayaṃ vuttaṃ. Gaṅgāpiṭṭheti gaṅgātīre.
tika-s0303t:233_4: Uppajjanasaññāpīti yaṃ kiñci nīlaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ ārabbha uppajjanasaññāpi,
tika-s0303t:234_4: Evanti yathā yāguādivatthuṃ puriso yāguādiatthāya pacati nipphādeti,
tika-s0303t:234_5: ayaṃ evaṃ ruppanādisabhāve dhammasamūhe yathāsakaṃ paccayehi abhisaṅkhariyamāne cetanāpadhāno dhammasamūho
tika-s0303t:234_6: pavattanatthaṃ visesapaccayo hutvā te abhisaṅkharoti niropeti nibbatteti.
tika-s0303t:234_10: Abhisaṅkharotīti itarehi paccayadhammehi adhikaṃ suṭṭhu paccayataṃ karoti.
tika-s0303t:234_13: Nibbattetīti tesaṃ dhammānaṃ ruppanādibhāvena nibbattiyā paccayo hotīti attho.
tika-s0303t:234_14: Cetayitalakkhaṇassa saṅkhārassāti idaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhadhammānaṃ cetanāpadhānattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:234_15: Tathā hi bhagavā suttantabhājanīye saṅkhārakkhandhaṃ vibhajantena cetanāva vibhattā.
tika-s0303t:236_10: Tathā hi sañjānanapadaṃ paccabhiññāṇanimittaṃ ākāragahaṇamattaṃ bodheti,
tika-s0303t:236_12: Pajānanapadaṃ pana tatopi visiṭṭhataraṃ pakārato avabodhaṃ bodheti.
tika-s0303t:236_17: Ñāṇasampayuttacittehi vipassantassa vipassanāya paguṇabhāve sati ñāṇavippayuttena cittenapi vipassanā
tika-s0303t:236_24: evaṃ viññāṇavijānanavasena vāyaṃ anurūpavaseneva pavattatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0303t:237_3: Lokavohāre ajātā asañjātā buddhi etassāti ajātabuddhi,
tika-s0303t:237_11: Ettha ca yathā heraññiko kahāpaṇaṃ cittādibhāvato uddhaṃ kūṭādibhāvaṃ rūpadassanādivasena uppattiṭṭhānatopi jānanto anekākārato jānāti,
tika-s0303t:237_12: evaṃ paññā ārammaṇaṃ nānappakārato jānāti paṭivijjhati,
tika-s0303t:237_13: tāya saddhiṃ pavattamānaviññāṇampi yathāvisayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ jānāti.
tika-s0303t:238_0: Evaṃ svāyaṃ nesaṃ jānane viseso aññesaṃ avisayo,
tika-s0303t:238_1: buddhānaṃ eva visayoti idaṃ visesaṃ milindapañhena vibhāvetuṃ “tenāhā”tiādimāha,
tika-s0303t:239_0: Attasuññānaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ dhammamattatāya kathitattā “anattalakkhaṇaṃ kathetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:239_4: itarāni dve lakkhaṇāni tassa parihārabhāvenāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0303t:240_1: bhikkhave”tiādidesanāya tīsu lakkhaṇesu idameva padhānabhāvena dassitaṃ,
tika-s0303t:240_4: Apacinātīti apacayagāmidhamme nivatteti ekaṃsato apacayagāmipaṭipadāya paripūraṇato.
tika-s0303t:240_11: Vidhūpetīti vaṭṭattayasaṅkhātaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ vigatadhūmaṃ vigatasantāpaṃ karotīti atthoti āha “nibbāpetī”ti.
tika-s0303t:241_0: Evaṃ passantiādi anāgāmiphale ṭhitassa ariyasāvakassa aggamaggaphalādhigamāya desanāti adhippāyenāha
tika-s0303t:241_4: sahapaṭhamamaggā vā sahavijjūpamadhammā vā vipassanākathāti dassento “ettakena ṭhānenā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0303t:242_2: Tattha nidassanaṃ dassento “āyasmantaṃ nītattheraṃ viyā”ti vatvā tamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “thero”tiādimāha.
tika-s0303t:242_3: Tattha khuraggeyevāti kesoropanatthaṃ khuradhārāya agge sīse ṭhapite tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānamukhena bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjanto arahattaṃ patvā.
tika-s0303t:245_5: Tathākaraṇañca evamete ettakampi appaṭirūpaṃ akatvā āyatiṃ sammā paṭipajjissantīti.
tika-s0303t:246_0: Ekadvīhikāyāti ekekassa ceva dvinnaṃ dvinnañca īhikā gati upasaṅkamanā ekadvīhikā.
tika-s0303t:246_1: Tenāha “ekeko ceva dve dve ca hutvā”ti.
tika-s0303t:246_2: Puthujjanānaṃ samuditānaṃ nāma kiriyā tādisīpi siyāti vuttaṃ “keḷimpi kareyyu”nti.
tika-s0303t:246_3: Parikappanavasena sammāsambuddhaṃ uddissa pesalā bhikkhūpi evaṃ karontīti.
tika-s0303t:247_2: patitaṃ yaṃ kiñcipi sīdantaranadiyaṃ vilīyantā sīdanteva,
tika-s0303t:247_3: tasmā taṃ parivāretvā ṭhitā yugandharādayopi sīdapabbatā nāma.
tika-s0303t:247_4: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “sīdantare sannisinnaṃ mahāsamuddaṃ viyā”ti.
tika-s0303t:250_0: Eraṇḍo anto rukkhānaṃ, tayo antā samāgatā”ti. –
tika-s0303t:251_4: Attho phalaṃ vaso etassāti atthavasaṃ, kāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0303t:253_3: Byāpādo hi uppajjamāno cittaṃ apagandhaṃ karoti,
tika-s0303t:253_5: Bhattanikkhittakāko viyāti idaṃ bhattaṭṭhānassa asaraṇena kākassa naṭṭhasatitā paññāyatīti katvā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0303t:254_3: itaro missakoti vattuṃ yuttanti adhippāyena “ettha cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:254_4: Evaṃ taṃ bhāventassa nirujjhanti evāti ekekamissakatāvasena gahetabbanti porāṇā.
tika-s0303t:258_1: Satthā paribhogaṃ karoti anuggaṇhanto “evaṃ hissa duggatimokkho bhavissatī”ti.
tika-s0303t:259_2: Īsādantassa naṅgalasadisadantassa hatthino evaṃ cittaṃ sameti.
tika-s0303t:261_3: sā ca anekadhā pavattā evāti vuttaṃ “vicayaso”ti,
tika-s0303t:261_4: anekakkhattuṃ pavattamānāpi vicayo evāti katvā “vicayenā”ti attho vutto.
tika-s0303t:261_7: evaṃ koṭṭhāsato paricchijja desite mayā dhamme katamassa jānanassa antarā āsavānaṃ khayo hotīti ekaccassa kaṅkhā hotiyevāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0303t:261_10: Tato eva taṇhāpaccayo hotīti vuttaṃ “tatojo so saṅkhāro”ti.
tika-s0303t:261_11: Tato taṇhāto so saṅkhāro jātoti catūsu esa diṭṭhisaṅkhāro diṭṭhūpanissayo saṅkhāro jāyati.
tika-s0303t:261_13: Evamettha bhagavā saḷāyatananāmarūpaviññāṇāni saṅkhārapakkhikāneva katvā dasseti.
tika-s0303t:262_0: Ettake ṭhāneti “idha bhikkhave assutavā puthujjano”tiādiṃ katvā yāva “na me bhavissatī”ti ettake ṭhāne.
tika-s0303t:262_4: no ca me siyā”tiādinā pavattaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhinti tathā tathā gahitadiṭṭhiṃ. “Iti kho,
tika-s0303t:262_7: Tattha tatthevāssa uppannadiṭṭhivivecanato imissā desanāya puggalajjhāsayena pavattitatā veditabbā,
tika-s0303t:262_9: Tatojo so saṅkhāroti tato vicikicchāya paccayabhūtataṇhāto jāto vicikicchāya sampayutto saṅkhāro.
tika-s0303t:262_10: Yadi sahajātādipaccayavasena tato taṇhāto jātoti tatojo saṅkhāroti vucceyya,
tika-s0303t:262_13: Itaro upanissayakoṭi idhādhippetāti dassento “appahīnattā”ti vatvā “yassa hī”tiādinā tamatthaṃ vivarati.
tika-s0303t:262_15: Yadi asati sahajātakoṭiyā upanissayakoṭiyā taṇhāpaccayā vicikicchāya sambhavo eva.
tika-s0303t:262_18: Vīsati sakkāyadiṭṭhiyo sassatadiṭṭhiṃ ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ vicikicchañca pakkhipitvā paccekaṃ aniccatāmukhena
tika-s0303t:262_19: vipassanaṃ dassetvā arahattaṃ pāpetvā desanā niṭṭhāpitāti āha “tevīsatiyā ṭhānesū”tiādi.
tika-s0303t:265_4: paṭhamaṃ pana sarūpaṃ pucchitvā puna tassa viseso pucchitabboti paṭhamaṃ “ime nu kho”tiādinā pucchaṃ karoti,
tika-s0303t:265_5: idhāpi ca so viseso eva tassa bhikkhuno antanti dasseti.
tika-s0303t:265_6: Ajānanto viya pucchati tesaṃ hetunti adhippāyo.
tika-s0303t:266_1: Pañcupādānakkhandhāti ettha visesato taṇhupādānassa gahaṇaṃ itarassa taggahaṇeneva gahitaṃ tadavinābhāvatoti chandarāgo eva uddhaṭo.
tika-s0303t:266_3: Yadipi khandhā upādānehi asahajātāpi honti upādānassa anārammaṇabhūtāpi,
tika-s0303t:266_6: Na hi asahajātaṃ anārammaṇañca upādānaṃ atthīti.
tika-s0303t:266_10: “Evaṃrūpo siya”nti evaṃpavattassa chandarāgassa “evaṃvedano siya”nti evaṃpavattiyā abhāvato tattha tattheva natasaṅkhārā bhijjanti,
tika-s0303t:266_11: tasmā rūpavedanārammaṇānaṃ chandarāgādīnaṃ abhāvato attheva chandarāgavemattatā.
tika-s0303t:271_3: “seyyohamasmī”ti mānaggāho ca taṇhāvaseneva hontīti taṇhāpi tathāpavattiyā paccayabhūtā tathāpavatti
tika-s0303t:271_4: evāti vuttaṃ “asmīti evaṃ pavattaṃ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhipapañcattayaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-s0303t:271_5: Daharasaddo bāladārakepi pavattatīti tato visesanatthaṃ “yuvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:271_6: Yuvāpi eko amaṇḍanasīloti tato visesanatthaṃ “maṇḍanakajātiko”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:271_9: Parammukhaṃ hutvā paññāyeyyāti yadi puratthimadisābhimukhaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ,
tika-s0303t:271_12: tathāpi kāci asadisatā bhaveyyāti vuttaṃ “vaṇṇādīhi asadisaṃ hutvā paññāyeyyā”ti.
tika-s0303t:271_14: Nibhāsarūpaṃ tāva kaṃsādimaye pabhassare maṇḍale paññāyatu,
tika-s0303t:271_16: Itaro “mahābhūtānaṃ visuddhatāyā”ti vadanto tatthāpi yathāladdhapabhassarabhāvenevāti dasseti.
tika-s0303t:271_17: Ettha ca maṇḍanajātiko puriso viya puthujjano,
tika-s0303t:271_20: mukhanimittaṃ upādāya dissamānarūpādi viya “asmī”ti sati “ahamasmī”ti “parosmī”tiādayo gāhavisesā.
tika-s0303t:274_6: Na pakkhāyantīti pakāsā hutvā na khāyanti.
tika-s0303t:275_0: Kāmānametaṃ adhivacananti padaṃ uddharitvā yena adhippāyena bhagavatā ninnaṃ pallalaṃ kāmānaṃ nidassanabhāvena ābhataṃ,
tika-s0303t:278_2: Diṭṭhigataṃ nāma jātaṃ khandhavinimuttassa sattassa gahitattā.
tika-s0303t:279_1: Paggayhāti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santike viya therassa sāriputtassa sammukhā attano laddhiṃ paggayha “evaṃ khvāha”nti evaṃ nicchayena vattuṃ asakkonto.
tika-s0303t:280_1: tassa attano gāhaṃ nijjhānakkhantiyāva yāthāvato pavedanaṃ.
tika-s0303t:280_8: Vattabbākārena vadanto atthato arahattaṃ byākaronto nāma hotīti adhippāyena vadati.
tika-s0303t:281_0: Etassa paṭhamamaggassāti etassa idāniyeva tiparivaṭṭadesanāvasāne tayā adhigatassa paṭhamamaggassa.
tika-s0303t:281_1: Catūhi yogehīti attato piyato udāsinato veritoti catūhipi uppajjanaanatthayogehi.
tika-s0303t:282_4: Paccatthikā me eteti ete rūpavedanādayo pañcupādānakkhandhā mayhaṃ paccatthikā anatthāvahattāti vipassanāñāṇena ñatvā.
tika-s0303t:285_1: Tasseva vihārassāti mahāvane yasmiṃ vihāre bhagavā viharati,
tika-s0303t:285_4: Yasmā ayaṃ thero ṭhapanīyaṃ pañhaṃ ṭhapanīyabhāvena na ṭhapesi, tasmā.
tika-s0303t:286_4: Vaṭṭavivaṭṭamevāti pañcannaṃ pana khandhānaṃ samanupassanāya vasena vaṭṭaṃ,
tika-s0303t:289_1: Nagaramajjhe mahāābādho uppajjīti nagaramajjhena āgacchanto kammasamuṭṭhāno mahanto ābādho uppajjati.
tika-s0303t:289_7: Satthu guṇasarīraṃ nāma navavidhalokuttaradhammādhigamamūlanti katvā vuttaṃ “navavidho hi…pe…
tika-s0303t:290_5: Ekaṃ dve ñāṇānīti ekaṃ dve paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni sabhāvato avassaṃ uppajjanti,
tika-s0303t:294_2: No ca svāhanti no ca su ahaṃ.
tika-s0303t:294_7: Dukkhaṃ patvāti dukkhuppattihetu sukhaṃ pattheti “evaṃ me dukkhapariḷāho na bhavissatī”ti.
tika-s0303t:294_11: tasmā sukhaṃ abhinandanto atthato dukkhaṃ abhinandati nāma.
tika-s0303t:297_10: Catukkhattuṃ gamanāgamanenāti catukkhattuṃ gamanena ca āgamanena ca. Tenāha –
tika-s0303t:298_0: Rūpameva asmīti vadatīti rūpakkhandhameva “asmī”ti gāhassa vatthuṃ katvā vadati. Adhigato taṇhāmāno.
tika-s0303t:299_2: Tayo khārā viya tisso anupassanā cittasaṃkilesassa visodhanato.
tika-s0303t:300_4: Vivaṭaṃ kātunti udāharaṇaṃ vaṇṇetvā pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ.
tika-s0303t:300_7: Uttānakaṃ kātunti upanayanigamehi tamatthaṃ vibhūtaṃ kātuṃ.
tika-s0303t:304_3: Niddosamevassa katvāti ādito anurūpattameva katvā saddhammaṃ kathessāmāti.
tika-s0303t:305_1: Anattani sati anattakatāni kammāni kamattānaṃ phusissantīti bhayaparitassanā ceva diṭṭhupādānañca uppajjati.
tika-s0303t:305_4: Kasmā panetassa vipassanamanuyuñjantassa evaṃ ahosīti tattha kāraṇaṃ vadati “ayaṃ kirā”tiādinā.
tika-s0303t:305_5: Evanti “ko nu kho me attā”ti evaṃ na hoti.
tika-s0303t:305_6: Tāvatikā vissatthīti “mayhaṃ dhammaṃ desetū”ti vuttavissāso atthīti attho.
tika-s0303t:308_0: 91-92. Etāni suttāni. Idhāgatānīti imasmiṃ vagge ānītāni saṅgītikārehīti.
tika-s0303t:314_1: Catūhi gāhehīti “rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”tiādinayappavattehi catūhi gāhehi.
tika-s0303t:317_7: Kathaṃ karomīti kena pakārenāhaṃ bālaṃ ajānantaṃ karomi.
tika-s0303t:320_1: Kenaci kāraṇena yujjhitvā gahetuṃ na sakkāti ayujjhā nāma.
tika-s0303t:321_2: Anupubbena pavaḍḍhitvāti tattha tattha uṭṭhitānaṃ khuddakamahantānaṃ pheṇapiṇḍānaṃ saṃsaggena pakārato vuddhiṃ patvā.
tika-s0303t:321_5: “Sāro nāma kiṃ bhaveyyā”ti vatvā sabbaso tadabhāvaṃ dassento “vilīyitvā viddhaṃseyyevā”ti āha.
tika-s0303t:321_8: evaṃ asāratāyapi aniccatāsiddhīti aniccatāya eva niccasāraṃ thirabhāvasāraṃ dhuvasāraṃ sāmīnivāsīkārakabhūtassa
tika-s0303t:321_12: Gahitopi upāyena tamatthaṃ na sādheti anarahattā.
tika-s0303t:322_0: Byāmamattampi etarahi manussānaṃ vasena. Avassameva bhijjati taraṅgabbhāhataṃ hutvā.
tika-s0303t:323_4: Tañhi saṃkaḍḍhitvā tato udakaṃ puṭaṃ karoti,
tika-s0303t:323_12: Yasmā ghammakāle sūriyātapasantāpābhinibbattarasmijālanipāte tādise bhūmipadese ito cito samuggatavātavegasamuddhaṭaviruḷhasaṅkhātesu
tika-s0303t:323_14: tasmā sabbaso sāravirahitāti vuttaṃ “saññāpi asārakaṭṭhena marīcisadisā”ti.
tika-s0303t:323_15: Yasmā ca passantānaṃ yebhuyyena udakākārena khāyati,
tika-s0303t:323_18: Phandatīti phandanākārappattā viya hoti appahīnataṇhassa puggalassa.
tika-s0303t:323_25: yadidaṃ anudakameva udakaṃ katvā dassanaṃ anagarameva nagaraṃ katvā gandhabbanāṭakādidassanaṃ.
tika-s0303t:324_0: Kukkukaṃ vuccati kadalikkhandhassa sabbapattavaṭṭīnaṃ abbhantare daṇḍakanti āha “akukkukajātanti anto asañjātaghanadaṇḍaka”nti.
tika-s0303t:325_6: Aññadeva ca āgamanakāle cittanti idañca oḷārikavaseneva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:325_7: Tathā hi ekaccharakkhaṇe anekakoṭisatasahassasaṅkhāni cittāni uppajjitvā nirujjhanti.
tika-s0303t:325_12: Nanu ca saññāpi marīci viya vippalambheti vañceti,
tika-s0303t:325_13: idampi viññāṇaṃ māyā viya vañcetīti ko imesaṃ visesoti?
tika-s0303t:325_15: Tathāpi saññā anudakaṃyeva udakaṃ katvā gāhāpentī,
tika-s0303t:325_16: apurisaññeva purisaṃ katvā gāhāpentī vippalambhanavasena appavisayā,
tika-s0303t:325_17: viññāṇaṃ pana yaṃ kiñci ataṃsabhāvaṃ taṃ katvā dassentī māyā viya mahāvisayā.
tika-s0303t:330_1: Sassataṃ sabbakālaṃ yāva kappavuṭṭhānā hontīti sassatiyo,
tika-s0303t:330_10: “Na paññāyeyyā”ti vatvā tamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “maggo hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:334_1: Yaṃ mahāsamuddoti ettha yanti samayassa paccāmasanaṃ.
tika-s0303t:334_3: So ca samayo ayanti dassento “pañcame sūriye uṭṭhite”ti āha.
tika-s0303t:334_4: Paricchedaṃ na vadāmi paricchedakārikāya aggamaggavijjāya anadhigatattā.
tika-s0303t:334_8: Puthujjanassa sakkāyānuparivattananti “santāne sattavohāro”ti taṃ tato aññaṃ katvā bhedena niddeso.
tika-s0303t:337_1: Diṭṭhigaddulanissitāyāti sahajātādipaccayavasena diṭṭhigaddulanissitāya nissāyeva pavattati tato attānaṃ vivecetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā.
tika-s0303t:338_3: channavutiyā pāsaṇḍesu taṃ saṅkhāsaññitaṃ pāsaṇḍaṃ paggayha vicaraṇakā.
tika-s0303t:338_6: Taṃ cittanti taṃ paṭakoṭṭhakacittaṃ gahetvā vicaranti.
tika-s0303t:338_12: sattavisesānaṃ vibhāgaṃ kātabba”nti tassa ubbattanakhipanapavattanādipayojanañcāti sabbametaṃ tathā cintetvā katattā cittena manasā cintitaṃ nāma.
tika-s0303t:338_13: Upāyapariyesanacittanti “hatthapādā evaṃ likhitabbā”tiādinā yathāvuttaupāyassa ceva pubbe pavattassa
tika-s0303t:338_15: Tatopi cittataranti tato cittakammatopi cittataraṃ cittakārena cintitappakārānaṃ sabbesaṃyeva cittakamme anipphajjanato.
tika-s0303t:338_18: So kammassa vicittabhāvo taṇhāvasena jāyatīti veditabbo.
tika-s0303t:338_21: Yoniṃ upanetīti taṃ taṃ aṇḍajādibhedaṃ yonivisesaṃ pāpeti vaṇṇaviseso viya phalikamaṇikaṃ.
tika-s0303t:338_22: Na hi visesā hitavicittasāmatthiyakammaṃ yoniṃ upaneti,
tika-s0303t:338_24: Yonimūlako tesaṃ cittabhāvoti yaṃ yaṃ yoniṃ kammaṃ satte upaneti,
tika-s0303t:339_0: Tiracchānagatacittabhāvato cittasseva savisesaṃ cittabhāvakaraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:339_1: Tattha cittaṃ nāmetaṃ cittatarameva veditabbanti sambandho.
tika-s0303t:339_4: Kammanānattaṃ mūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ etesanti kammanānattamūlakā, tesaṃ.
tika-s0303t:339_5: Liṅganānattaṃ itthiliṅgādinānattavasena ceva taṃtaṃsaṇṭhānanānattavasena ca veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0303t:342_9: Saṅkhātabbe atthe aniyamato vuccamāne saṅkhāto aniyamattho vāsaddo vattabboti “aṭṭha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:342_11: ekaṃso pana gahetabboti “aṭṭha vā dasa vā dvādasa vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:343_5: Ñāṇassa hi sabhāvato satinepakkato ca tikkhabhāvo,
tika-s0303t:343_11: Anulomaṭṭhānassa hi vipassanā gahitagabbhā nāma tadā maggagabbhassa gahitattā.
tika-s0303t:344_3: Dārūnaṃ gaṇḍaṃ haratīti palagaṇḍoti etena palena gaṇḍahāro “palagaṇḍo”ti pacchimapade uttarapadalopena niddesoti dasseti.
tika-s0303t:344_5: Sammadeva khepīyanti etena kāyaduccaritādīnīti saṅkhepo, tena.
tika-s0303t:344_6: Vipassanaṃ anuyuñjantassa puggalasseva divase divase āsavānaṃ parikkhayo idha “vipassanāyānisaṃso”ti adhippeto.
tika-s0303t:345_3: Khajjamānānanti saṅkhādantena viya udakena khepiyamānānaṃ bandhanānaṃ.
tika-s0303t:345_6: Okkhāyamāne pakkhāyamāneti vividhapaṭipattiyā ukkhāyamāne paṭisaṅkhānupassanāya pakkhāyamāne.
tika-s0303t:348_1: Bhāventassāti vipassanāya maggaṃ bhāventassa uppannasaññā. Tenāha –
tika-s0303t:349_0: Lāyananti lāyanaṃ viya nayanaṃ viya nicchoṭanaṃ viya ca aniccasaññāñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0303t:349_1: Iminā atthenāti iminā yathāvuttena pāḷiyā atthena,
tika-s0303t:349_2: upamā saṃsandetabbāti ettha pabbajalāyako viya yogāvacaro.
tika-s0303t:349_3: Lāyanādinā tassa tattha katakiccatāya parituṭṭhi viya imassa kilese sabbaso chinditvā phalasamāpattisukhena kālassa vītināmanā.
tika-s0303t:350_2: Samosaritvāti chidde anupavisanavasena ca āhacca avaṭṭhānena ca samosaritvā ṭhitā.
tika-s0303t:350_3: Kūṭaṃ viya aniccasaññā aniccānupassanāvasena avaṭṭhānassa mūlabhāvato.
tika-s0303t:350_7: Aniccasaññā lokiyāti idaṃ aniccasaññānupassanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:350_8: Aniccānupassanāmukhena adhigataariyamagge uppannasaññā aniccasaññāti vattabbataṃ labhatīti “aniccasaññā,
tika-s0303t:350_10: bhāvitā bahulīkatā sabbaṃ kāmarāgaṃ pariyādiyatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:350_11: Tathā hi dhammasaṅgahe “yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ saññaṃ bhāvetī”tiādinā saññāpi uddhaṭā.
tika-s0303t:360_0: Tatiyampi tathevāti iminā “pañcakkhandhe catusaccavasena yojetvā”ti idaṃ upasaṃharati.
tika-s0303t:363_6: Tattha ukkaṭṭhāya pariññāya kiccadassanavasena atthaṃ dassento “pariññeyyeti parijānitabbe samatikkamitabbe”ti,
tika-s0303t:363_16: Samatikkamitvā ṭhitanti pajahitvā ṭhitanti ayamettha attho.
tika-s0303t:366_0: 107-112. Cattāri saccāni kathitāni assādādīnaṃ samudayādīnañca desitattā.
tika-s0303t:372_2: samannāgatoti “idaṃ dukkhanti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātī”tiādinā nayena vuttāya catūsu ariyasaccesu aññāṇasabhāvāya avijjāya sammohena samannāgato.
tika-s0303t:372_3: Ettāvatāti ettakena kāraṇena avijjāgato samaṅgībhūtena upagato,
tika-s0303t:373_0: Dutiyepīti vijjāsutte. “Vijjāvasena desanā”ti ayameva visesoti āha “eseva nayo”ti.
tika-s0303t:382_4: Pāraṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ saṃsārassa pārimanti katvā.
tika-s0303t:382_9: parimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmī”ti āgatattā vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathikanti vattuṃ sakkā.
tika-s0303t:386_1: Ābādhaṭṭhenāti ādito uppattito paṭṭhāya bādhanaṭṭhena rujanaṭṭhena.
tika-s0303t:386_7: paccayaṭṭhenāti yathāpavattamānānaṃ dhātādīnaṃ visabhāgabhūtamahābhūtasamuṭṭhānassa ābādhassa paccayabhāvena.
tika-s0303t:386_12: Suññato anattatoti ettha “parato”ti padassa saṅgaho kātabbo,
tika-s0303t:389_4: Kammaṭṭhānassa uggahadhāraṇaparicayamanasikāravasena pavattañāṇaṃ kammaṭṭhānasutavasena nipphajjanato “suta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:402_2: tattha ukkuḷavikulato akkamantaṃ yāva kesaggaṃ anudahatāya kucchitaṃ kuḷanti kukkuḷaṃ,
tika-s0303t:402_3: rūpavedanādi pana tatopi kañci kālaṃ anudahanato mahāpariḷāhanaṭṭhena ca kukkuḷaṃ viyāti kukkuḷaṃ.
tika-s0303t:410_2: Pahānaṃ apassantoti therassa kira bhagavati pemaṃ adhimattaṃ.
tika-s0303t:421_1: Mārasaddoyaṃ bhāvasādhanoti dassento “māro vā assāti maraṇaṃ vā bhaveyyā”ti āha.
tika-s0303t:421_2: Māretāti maritabbo māraṃ maraṇaṃ etabboti āha “māretabbo”ti.
tika-s0303t:421_3: Anupādānibbānatthāti phalavimuttisaṅkhātā arahato arahantatā nāma yāvadeva anupādānibbānatthā.
tika-s0303t:421_4: Nibbānabbhantareti anupādānibbānādhigamassa abbhantare tato orameva idaṃ maggaṃ brahmacariyaṃ vussati,
tika-s0303t:424_6: Yantarajju viya bhavapabandhassa nayanato bhavarajjūti taṇhā vuttā.
tika-s0303t:429_1: Rūpādivinimuttaṃ maraṇaṃ nāma natthi rūpādīnaṃyeva vibhave maraṇasamaññāti.
tika-s0303t:444_1: Na ete vātāti ye ime rukkhasākhādibhañjanakarā,
tika-s0303t:444_2: ete sattakāyattā vātā nāma na honti.
tika-s0303t:444_10: Ayañhi vāyu kāyassa niccataṃ abhinivissa ṭhito “mā ca aniccatā paro hotū”ti na vātā vāyantīti bādhati.
tika-s0303t:444_13: Gabbho pana na nikkhamati kūṭaṭṭhādibhāveneva tassa labbhanato.
tika-s0303t:444_15: evaṃ tiṭṭhanato lokassa pana tathā matimattanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0303t:447_3: Mutaṃ gandhāyatanādi tividhaṃ sampattagāhīhi ghānādīhi patvā gahetabbato.
tika-s0303t:447_4: Avasesāni cakkhādīni sattāyatanāni viññātaṃ nāma kevalaṃ manoviññāṇena vijānitabbato.
tika-s0303t:447_6: yaṃ kiñci pāpuṇitabbaṃ pariyesitvā gavesitvā sampattanti anuppattaṃ.
tika-s0303t:447_9: “Pattaṃ pariyesita”nti etasmiṃ padadvaye catukkaṃ sambhavatīti taṃ dassetvā tassa vasena pattapariyesitapadāni,
tika-s0303t:447_10: tato manasā anuvicaritañca nīharitvā dassetuṃ “lokasmiṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:447_11: Tattha pariyesitvā pattaṃ nāma pariyesanāya pariggāhabhāvato.
tika-s0303t:447_12: Pariyesitaṃ nāma kevalaṃ pariyesitamevāti katvā pariyesitvā pattassa manussānuvicaritassa vuttattā.
tika-s0303t:447_13: Paṭhamavikappe saṅkaro atthīti asaṅkarato ca dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:447_15: Tañhi manoviññāṇena gahitattā manasā anuvicaritaṃ nāma na diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ.
tika-s0303t:450_1: Dinnanti deyyadhammasīsena dānaṃ vuttanti āha “dinnassa phalābhāvaṃ sandhāyā”ti,
tika-s0303t:450_8: Paraloke ṭhitassa ayaṃ loko natthīti paraloke ṭhitassa kammunā laddhabbo ayaṃ loko na hoti.
tika-s0303t:450_9: Idhaloke ṭhitassapi paraloko natthīti idhaloke ṭhitassa kammunā laddhabbo paraloko na hoti.
tika-s0303t:450_12: Ime sattā yattha yattha bhave yoniādīsu ca ṭhitā,
tika-s0303t:450_14: Phalābhāvavasenāti mātāpitūsu sammāpaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattīnaṃ phalassa abhāvavasena “natthi mātā,
tika-s0303t:450_17: nāpi tesu idāni kariyamānasakkārāsakkārānaṃ abhāvavasena tesaṃ lokapaccakkhattā.
tika-s0303t:450_18: Pubbuḷakassa viya imesaṃ sattānaṃ uppādo nāma kevalo,
tika-s0303t:450_19: na bhavato cavitvā āgamanapubbakoti dassanatthaṃ “natthi sattā opapātikā”ti vuttanti āha –
tika-s0303t:450_21: Samaṇena nāma yāthāvato jānantena kassaci akathetvā saññatena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0303t:450_24: tathā ca attano sampādanassa kassaci avassayo eva na siyā tattha tattheva ucchijjanatoti āha “ye imañca…pe…
tika-s0303t:451_1: Yathā pana mattikāya nibbattaṃ bhājanaṃ mattikāmayaṃ,
tika-s0303t:451_6: Upagacchatīti pubbe bāhirapathavīkāyato tadekadesabhūtā pathavī āgantvā ajjhattikabhāvappattiyā sattabhāvena
tika-s0303t:451_7: saṇṭhitā idāni ghaṭādipathavī viya tameva bāhirapathavīkāyaṃ upeti upagacchati,
tika-s0303t:451_8: sabbaso tena nibbisesataṃ ekībhāvameva gacchatīti attho.
tika-s0303t:451_9: Āpādīsupi eseva nayoti ettha pajjunnena mahāsamuddato gahitaāpo viya vassodakabhāvena punapi mahāsamuddaṃ,
tika-s0303t:451_11: mahāvāyukhandhato niggatamahāvāyo viya tameva vāyukhandhaṃ upeti upagacchatīti diṭṭhigatiko sayameva attano vādaṃ bhindati.
tika-s0303t:451_13: Manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni ākāsaṃ pakkhandanti tesaṃ visayabhāvā visayāpīti vadati.
tika-s0303t:451_14: Visayiggahaṇena hi visayā gahitā eva hontīti.
tika-s0303t:451_16: Sarīrameva padānīti adhippetaṃ sarīrena taṃtaṃkiriyāya pajjitabbato.
tika-s0303t:454_6: idha pana sumaṅgalavilāsiniyaṃ viya tajjanaṃ paribhāsanaṃ daṇḍeneva saṅgahetvā “daṇḍena pīḷentassa”icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:454_7: Sokaṃ sayaṃ karontassāti parassa sokakāraṇaṃ sayaṃ karontassa,
tika-s0303t:454_10: Sayampi phandatoti parassa vibādhanappayogena sayampi phandato.
tika-s0303t:454_11: Atipātayatoti padaṃ suddhakattuatthe hetukattuatthe ca vattatīti āha –
tika-s0303t:455_0: Gharassa bhitti anto ca bahi ca sandhitā hutvā ṭhitāva gharasandhi.
tika-s0303t:455_4: Pāpaṃ na karīyati pubbe asato uppādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā,
tika-s0303t:455_6: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ sattā pāpe pavattantīti āha “sattā pana karomāti evaṃsaññino hontī”ti evaṃ kirassa hoti
tika-s0303t:455_7: imesañhi sattānaṃ hiṃsādikiriyā na attānaṃ phusati tassa niccatāya nibbikārattā,
tika-s0303t:456_1: uttaradisā patirūpadesoti adhippāyena “dakkhiṇañcepī”tiādi vuttanti āha “dakkhiṇatīre manussā kakkhaḷā”tiādi.
tika-s0303t:456_5: Damasaddo hi indriyasaṃvarassa uposathasīlassa ca vācako idhādhippeto.
tika-s0303t:456_16: tassa santāne phalassa nibbattiyā paccayabhāvena pavatti.
tika-s0303t:459_4: Natthi balanti sattānaṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikanibbānasampattiāvahaṃ balaṃ nāma kiñci natthi.
tika-s0303t:459_8: Aññamaññavevacanānīti tassā tassā kiriyāya ussannaṭṭhena balaṃ,
tika-s0303t:459_10: tameva daḷhaggāhabhāvato porisaṃ dhuraṃ vahantena pavattetabbato purisathāmo,
tika-s0303t:459_11: paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanappavattiyā purisaparakkamoti vuttoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0303t:460_3: te pana so ekindriyādivasena vibhajitvā vadatīti āha “ekindriyo”tiādi.
tika-s0303t:460_6: Jīvanato pāṇaṃ dhārentā viya vaḍḍhanato jīvāti sāliyavādike vadanti.
tika-s0303t:460_8: Natthi tesaṃ balaṃ vīriyanti abalā avīriyā.
tika-s0303t:460_9: Niyatatāti acchejjasuttāvutābhejjamaṇino viya niyatappavattitāya gatijātibandhāpavaggavasena niyamo.
tika-s0303t:460_10: Tattha tattha gamananti channaṃ abhijātīnaṃ vasena tāsu tāsu gatīsu upagamanaṃ.
tika-s0303t:460_15: evaṃ sabbassapi lokassa hetupaccayehi vinā tathā tathā pariṇāmo,
tika-s0303t:460_19: Sukhañca dukkhañca paṭisaṃvedentīti vadantā adukkhamasukhabhūbhiṃ sabbena sabbaṃ na jānantīti ulliṅgento
tika-s0303t:463_1: Akatāti samena vā visamena vā kenaci hetunā na katā eva.
tika-s0303t:463_2: Kenaci kataṃ karaṇaṃ vidhānaṃ natthi etesanti akatavidhānā.
tika-s0303t:463_3: Padadvayenapi loke kenaci hetupaccayena nesaṃ abhinibbattitābhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0303t:463_4: Iddhiyāpi na nimmitāti kassaci iddhimato devassa brahmuno vā iddhiyāpi na nimmitā.
tika-s0303t:463_7: Rūpasaddādayo hi pathavīkāyādīhi appaṭibaddhavuttikāti tassa laddhi.
tika-s0303t:463_8: Yathā pabbatakūṭaṃ kenaci anibbattitaṃ kassaci ca anibbattakaṃ,
tika-s0303t:463_13: aññathā yato kutoci yassa kassaci uppatti siyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0303t:463_16: Vikārābhāvena hi tesaṃ sattannaṃ kāyānaṃ esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitatā.
tika-s0303t:463_19: Avipariṇāmadhammattā eva ca ne aññamaññaṃ na byābādhenti.
tika-s0303t:463_20: Sati hi vikāraṃ āpādetabbatāya byābādhakatāpi siyā,
tika-s0303t:463_21: tathā anuggahetabbatāya anuggāhakatāti tadabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “nāla”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:463_23: Jīvasattamānaṃ kāyānaṃ niccatāya nibbikārābhāvato na hantabbatā,
tika-s0303t:463_24: na ghāṭetabbatā cāti neva koci hantā ghātetā vā.
tika-s0303t:464_2: “Pañca ca kammuno satānī”ti padassa atthadassanaṃ “pañca kammasatāni cā”ti.
tika-s0303t:464_3: Eseva nayoti iminā “kevalaṃ takkamattena niratthakadiṭṭhiṃ dīpetī”ti imameva atthaṃ atidisati.
tika-s0303t:464_4: Ettha ca takkamattakenāti iminā yasmā takkikā niraṅkusatāya parikappanassa yaṃ kiñci attano parikappitaṃ
tika-s0303t:464_5: sārato maññamānā tatheva abhinivissa takkadiṭṭhigāhaṃ gaṇhanti,
tika-s0303t:464_6: tasmā na tesaṃ diṭṭhivatthūsu viññūhi vicāraṇā kātabbāti dasseti.
tika-s0303t:465_5: Te kira “sacchandarāgā paribhuñjantī”ti adhippāyena catūsu paccayesu kaṇṭake pakkhipitvā khādantīti vadanti.
tika-s0303t:465_7: Yasmā te paṇītapaṇīte paccaye paṭisevantīti tassa micchāgāho.
tika-s0303t:465_8: Ñāyaladdhepi paccaye paribhuñjamānā ājīvakasamayassa vilomagāhitāya paccayesu kaṇṭake pakkhipitvā khādanti nāmāti vadantīti apare.
tika-s0303t:465_11: Tathā hi te kaṇṭake vattantā viya hontīti kaṇṭakavuttikāti vuttā.
tika-s0303t:465_14: Te kira ājīvakasamaye ājīvakaladdhiyā daḷhagāhitāya nigaṇṭhehipi paṇḍaratarā.
tika-s0303t:465_15: Nandādayo kira tathārūpaṃ ājīvakapaṭipattiṃ ukkaṃsaṃ pāpetvā ṭhitā,
tika-s0303t:465_16: tasmā nigaṇṭhehi ājīvakasāvakehi ca paṇḍaratarā vuttā.
tika-s0303t:466_2: Bhikkhu ca pannakotiādi tesaṃ pāḷi eva.
tika-s0303t:466_6: attano vā paṭipattiyā paṭipakkhe jinitvā ṭhito.
tika-s0303t:466_7: So kira tathābhūto dhammampi kassaci na katheti.
tika-s0303t:466_9: Niṭṭhuhanādivippakāre kenaci katepi khamanavasena na kiñci vadatīti vadanti.
tika-s0303t:466_10: Alābhinti “so na kumbhimukhā paṭiggaṇhātī”tiādinā nayena vuttaalābhahetusamāyogena alābhiṃ.
tika-s0303t:466_11: Tato eva jighacchādubbalyaparetatāya sayanaparāyaṇaṃ samaṇaṃ pannabhūmīti vadanti.
tika-s0303t:467_3: Bahū devāti cātumahārājikādibrahmakāyikādivasena tesaṃ antarabhedavasena bahū devā.
tika-s0303t:467_4: Tattha cātumahārājikānaṃ ekacce antarabhedā mahāsamayasuttavasena dīpetabbā.
tika-s0303t:469_0: Aparipakkaṃ saṃsaraṇanimittaṃ sīlādinā paripāceti nāma sīghaṃyeva visuddhippattiyā.
tika-s0303t:469_1: Paripakkaṃ kammaṃ phussa phussa patvā patvā kāle paripakkabhāvāpādanena byantī karoti nāma.
tika-s0303t:469_3: Nibbeṭhiyamānameva paletīti upamāya sattānaṃ saṃsāro anukkamena khīyateva,
tika-s0303t:469_7: sutte pana asati kuto gacchati suttaguḷaṃ. Tenāha –
tika-s0303t:469_10: Kālavasenāti attani veṭhetvā ṭhitaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ yathāvuttassa kālassa vasena nibbeṭhiyamāno bālo ca paṇḍito ca paleti gacchati,
tika-s0303t:476_0: Ārammaṇamevāti kasiṇasaṅkhātaṃ ārammaṇameva. Takkisaddena suddhatakkikānaṃ gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0303t:477_2: tasmiṃ sati tadupādāya evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjatī”ti vuttaaniccadukkhavasenāti.
tika-s0303t:477_4: Tiparivaṭṭavasenāti tehiyeva chabbīsatiyā suttehi catutthapeyyāle tiparivaṭṭavasena vuttoti yojanā.
tika-s0303t:496_4: Itaro kāmaṃ upatāpanamalīnabhāvakaraṇavasena upakkileso lokuttarassa natthi,
tika-s0303t:496_9: magganibbānānaṃ pana nekkhammabhāvo ukkaṃsato gahito evāti āha “nekkhammaninnanti navalokuttaradhammaninna”nti.
tika-s0303t:502_1: Na evaṃ hotīti ettha “ahaṃ samāpajjāmī”ti vā,
tika-s0303t:502_2: “ahaṃ samāpanno”ti vā mā hotu tadā tādisābhogābhāvato.
tika-s0303t:502_4: Sabbathāpi na hotveva ahaṅkārassa sabbaso pahīnattā.
tika-s0303t:506_3: Tattha tattha gamananti tesaṃ sāsanaharaṇavasena taṃ taṃ gāmantaradesantaraṃ.
tika-s0303t:506_4: Evamārocesīti attukkaṃsanaparavambhanarahitaṃ kaṇṇasukhaṃ pemanīyaṃ hadayaṅgamaṃ therassa dhammakathaṃ
tika-s0303t:506_5: sutvā pasannamānasā evaṃ “dhammikaṃ samaṇā sakyaputtiyā”tiādinā sāsanassa guṇasaṃkittanavācaṃ kulānaṃ ārocesi.
tika-s0303t:513_4: Upapatitvā viyāti kutocipi avapatitvā viya nibbattā.
tika-s0303t:516_1: Vissaṭṭhakāyāti “ye cammena vā rudhirena vā aṭṭhinā vā atthikā,
tika-s0303t:516_2: te sabbaṃ gaṇhantū”ti tattha nirapekkhacittatāya adhiṭṭhitasīlatāya pariccattasarīrā.
tika-s0303t:522_9: Anuddharaṇīyanāgāti ānubhāvamahantatāya ca vasanaṭṭhānaviduggatāya ca uddharituṃ asakkuṇeyyā nāgā.
tika-s0303t:522_10: Te “sattavidhā”ti vatvā sarūpato vasanaṭṭhānato ca dassento “kambalassatarā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0303t:522_11: Tattha kambalassatarā dhataraṭṭhāti ime jātivasena vuttā.
tika-s0303t:522_16: Te nāge koci supaṇṇo uddharituṃ na sakkotīti sambandho.
tika-s0303t:522_19: tattha ca vuttanayeneva attho veditabboti adhippāyo.
tika-s0303t:527_6: Tesaṃ tesaṃ rukkhagacchalatānaṃ mūlaṃ paṭicca pavatto gandho mūlagandho,
tika-s0303t:527_11: Taṃ nissāyāti taṃ mūlagandhaṃ rukkhaṃ paccayaṃ katvā nibbattā.
tika-s0303t:527_13: mūlameva vā tesaṃ paccayoti dassento “so hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0303t:527_19: idha pana sabbaso gahitattā samudāyagandho veditabbo.
tika-s0303t:527_21: Soti so sabbo mūlādigato gandho gandhasamudāyo idha gandhagandho nāma.
tika-s0303t:527_22: Tassa gandhassa gandheti tassa samudāyagandhassa tathābhūte gandhe.
tika-s0303t:527_23: Sarikkhaṃ sadisaṃ paṭidānaṃ etissāti sarikkhadānaṃ, patthanā.
tika-s0303t:532_1: Lokaṃ vālentā saṃvarantā chādentā ahanti pariyesantīti valāhā,
tika-s0303t:532_12: Abbhaṃ uppajjatīti tahaṃ tahaṃ paṭalaṃ uṭṭhahati.
tika-s0303t:532_17: Tadā hi viddho vigatavalāhako devo bhavituṃ yutto.
tika-s0303t:533_4: Aññenapi kaṇhapāpikasattānaṃ pāpakammapaccayā uppannavināsameghena vuṭṭhena so so deso vinassateva.
tika-s0303t:538_3: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana imameva atthaṃ hetuatthena karaṇavacanena dassetuṃ “aññāṇenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0303t:538_4: Sabbānīti “aññāṇā adassanā anabhisamayā”tiādīni padāni ekādasasu suttesu āgatāni,
tika-s0303t:538_5: pañcapaññāsa veyyākaraṇāni vuttāni suttesu pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ vasena veyyākaraṇassa āgatattā.
tika-s0303t:544_2: Tayidaṃ samādhikosallattaṃ saha jhānaṅgayogena catubbidho jhānasamādhi,
tika-s0303t:544_3: tasmā taṃ taṃ vibhāgaṃ jānantassa siddhaṃ hotīti āha –
tika-s0303t:544_8: upekkhekaggatāvasena catutthaṃ duvaṅgikamevāti evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ jhāne taṃtaṃaṅgānaṃ vavatthāne kusalo.
tika-s0303t:544_11: Kallaṃ katvāti samādhānassa paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ dūrīkaraṇena sahakārīkāraṇañca samādhānena samāpajjane cittaṃ samatthaṃ katvā.
tika-s0303t:544_13: Tatiyādīsu nayesu akusalopi jhānatthāya paṭipannattā “jhāyītevā”ti vutto.
tika-s0303t:547_1: Dutiyādisuttesu ṭhitikusaloti ettha antogadhahetuattho ṭhiti- saddo,
tika-s0303t:547_4: Sattaṭṭhaaccharāmattanti sattaṭṭhaaccharāmattaṃ khaṇaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ na sakkoti adhiṭṭhānavasībhāvassa anipphāditattā.
tika-s0303t:547_5: Yathāparicchedena kālena vuṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti vuṭṭhānavasībhāvassa anipphāditattā.
tika-s0303t:547_7: tasmiṃ kallite kallitabhāvena kasiṇārammaṇesu “idaṃ nāma asukassā”ti visayavasena samāpajjituṃ asakkonto na samādhismiṃ ārammaṇakusalo.
tika-s0303t:547_8: Na samādhismiṃ gocarakusaloti samādhismiṃ nipphāditabbe tassa gocare kammaṭṭhānasaññite pavattiṭṭhāne
tika-s0303t:547_12: evaṃ bahulīkātabba’nti ajānanto tattha akusalo nāmā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0303t:547_13: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ abhinīharitunti kammaṭṭhānaṃ visesabhāgiyatāya abhinīharituṃ akusalo.
tika-s0303t:547_18: saddena sakkaccakāripadādīnaṃyeva saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo catukkānaṃ vuttattā.
tika-s0303t:547_21: Na hi lokuttaradhammesu akosallaṃ nāma labbhati.
